    • Field Detail

      • MUST

        public static final String MUST
        An absolute requirement of the specification.
        See Also:
        RFC 2119, Constant Field Values

      • SHOULD

        public static final String SHOULD
        There may exist valid reasons in particular circumstances to ignore a particular item, but the full implications must be understood and carefully weighed before choosing a different course.
        See Also:
        RFC 2119, Constant Field Values

      • MAY

        public static final String MAY
        An item is truly optional. One vendor may choose to include the item because a particular marketplace requires it or because the vendor feels that it enhances the product while another vendor may omit the same item.
        See Also:
        RFC 2119, Constant Field Values

      • NR

        public static final String NR
        A Linked Data Platform Non-RDF Source (LDP-NR). An LDPR whose state is not represented in RDF. These are binary or text documents that do not have useful RDF representations.
        See Also:
        LDP Terminology, Constant Field Values
